sentences.sContent: This policy is scarcely consonant with the government’s declared aims.
sentences.sCn: 这项政策与政府所宣称的目标基本上不符。

synos.tran: [语]辅音的；一致的；[电子]和谐的

remMethod.val: con(共同) + son(声音) + ant → 同声的 → 协调的

words.tran: 带辅音性质的；辅音的；子音的

trans.tranOther: relating to a combination of musical notes that sounds pleasant
a speech sound made by partly or completely stopping the flow of air through your mouth
